name: tm50
effect: Teaches Overheat to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Overheat to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Nightmare Gen I: Substitute)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Enables full-power
attack, but sharply
lowers SP. ATK.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Enables full-power
attack, but sharply
lowers SP. ATK.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An intense attack
that also sharply
reduces the user’s
SP. ATK stat.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user attacks the foe at full
power using fiery energy. It also
sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk.

power using fiery energy. It also
sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk.

power. The attack’s recoil harshly
reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user lands and rests its body. This move restores
the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two
to five times in a row.
